description: Yarrow (Achillea millefolium 'Paprika') is an amazing plant species that thrives in full sun and well-drained soil. With its tall and upright stems, 'Paprika' produces bright, rich green leaves and pale orange-red flowers that bloom from summer through fall. This colourful species is deer and rabbit resistant, drought tolerant, and exhibits higher levels of medicinal oils than common white and pink varieties. Its height of 1 to 3 feet and spread of 1 to 2 feet make it an ideal specimen for borders and garden beds. Yarrow's exceptional performance in the garden and its ability to offer us medicinal health benefits make it a truly stand-out species.
